id: evidence-service-abci-query
title: "ABCIQuery defines a query handler that supports ABCI queries directly to the
application, bypassing Tendermint completely. The ABCI query must contain
a valid and supported path, including app, custom, p2p, and store."

application, bypassing Tendermint completely. The ABCI query must contain
a valid and supported path, including app, custom, p2p, and store."

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/cosmos/base/tendermint/v1beta1/abci_query"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



ABCIQuery defines a query handler that supports ABCI queries directly to the
application, bypassing Tendermint completely. The ABCI query must contain
a valid and supported path, including app, custom, p2p, and store.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"data","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string","format":"byte"}},{"name":"path","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"height","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string","format":"int64"}},{"name":"prove","in":"query","schema":{"type":"boolean"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"A successful response.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"ABCIQueryResponse defines the response structure for the ABCIQuery gRPC query.\n\nNote: This type is a duplicate of the ResponseQuery proto type defined in\nTendermint.","type":"object","properties":{"code":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"codespace":{"type":"string"},"height":{"type":"string","format":"int64"},"index":{"type":"string","format":"int64"},"info":{"type":"string","title":"nondeterministic"},"key":{"type":"string","format":"byte"},"log":{"type":"string","title":"nondeterministic"},"proof_ops":{"description":"ProofOps is Merkle proof defined by the list of ProofOps.\n\nNote: This type is a duplicate of the ProofOps proto type defined in Tendermint.","type":"object","properties":{"ops":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"ProofOp defines an operation used for calculating Merkle root. The data could\nbe arbitrary format, providing necessary data for example neighbouring node\nhash.\n\nNote: This type is a duplicate of the ProofOp proto type defined in Tendermint.","properties":{"data":{"type":"string","format":"byte"},"key":{"type":"string","format":"byte"},"type":{"type":"string"}}}}}},"value":{"type":"string","format":"byte"}}}}}},"default":{"description":"An unexpected error response.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"code":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"details":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"@type":{"type":"string"}},"additionalProperties":{}}},"message":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
